overview: Chiquito de la Calzada was an artist, born in tablaos as an accompanying singer, who unintentionally revolutionized the way of doing comedy in Spain. More than 20 years after his debut as a comedian, his surrealist language is still present in our social habits. Chiquito passed away on November 11, 2017.
title: Chiquito, el cantaor de atrás
